item.title: VBScript to Eject CD Tray
item.description: I think this is an old IT Department prank, but still a fun trick to play on your coworkers at the office, once in a long while. While our office policy is to lock your computer physically, and by using Windows lock (Or sleep mode) when you step away from your desk, not all of our coworkers remember to do so, everytime. Let this be their friendly--and annoying--reminder to always secure your workstation!
